name: limtr-helper-service
description: microservice with helper modules for aws limit monitor
author: aws-solutions-builder

scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/lib
scripts.build:copy: cp index.js dist/ && cp -r lib/*.js dist/lib
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
